member.summary: Gets the default filename for the external logging settings configuration file.

member.name: T:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.LogMessageTemplate
member.summary: Provides static methods for logging specific HTTP-related events using strongly-typed logging templates.

member.name: M:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.LogMessageTemplate.PageView(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger,System.String)
member.summary: Logs an informational message indicating that a specific page has been viewed.
member.param: The logger to be used for logging the event.
The name of the page that was viewed.

member.name: M:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.LogMessageTemplate.BadRequest(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger,System.String)
member.summary: Logs a warning message for a Bad Request (400) event, including the requested path.
member.param: The logger to be used for logging the event.
The path of the HTTP request that caused the Bad Request.

member.name: M:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.LogMessageTemplate.Unauthorized(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger,System.String)
member.summary: Logs a warning message for an Unauthorized (401) event, including the requested path.
member.param: The logger to be used for logging the event.
The path of the HTTP request that caused the Unauthorized access.

member.name: M:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.LogMessageTemplate.Forbidden(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Logs a warning message for a Forbidden (403) event, including the requested path and user information.
member.param: The logger to be used for logging the event.
The path of the HTTP request that caused the Forbidden error.
The user associated with the HTTP request; defaults to "Not known" if not provided.

member.name: M:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.LogMessageTemplate.NotFound(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger,System.String)
member.summary: Logs a warning message for a Not Found (404) event, including the requested path.

The path of the HTTP request that resulted in the Not Found status.

The path of the HTTP request that caused the Conflict.

member.summary: The class which is used to configure the logging.

member.summary: The Log level to use.

member.name: T:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.Args
member.summary: Represents the configuration arguments for logging components.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.Args.ServerUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL of the server used for logging purposes.
member.remarks: The default value is an empty string if not explicitly set. This property can be used to configure the target server address for logging connectivity.

member.name: T:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.Console
member.summary: Represents a console logging configuration for formatting output in a logging system.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.Console.FormatterName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the formatter used for console logging output.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.Console.FormatterOptions
member.summary: Gets or sets the options for configuring the console log formatter.

member.name: T:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.FormatterOptions
member.summary: Represents the configuration options for formatting log output.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.FormatterOptions.SingleLine
member.summary: Indicates whether the log output should be formatted as a single line.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.FormatterOptions.IncludeScopes
member.summary: Determines whether scope information should be included in the log output.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.FormatterOptions.TimestampFormat
member.summary: Specifies the format for timestamps in log entries.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.FormatterOptions.UseUtcTimestamp
member.summary: Determines whether to use the UTC time zone for timestamps in the log output.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.FormatterOptions.JsonWriterOptions
member.summary: Represents configurable options for customizing the behavior of JSON writing within the logging formatter.

member.name: T:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.JsonWriterOptions
member.summary: Represents options for configuring the behavior of a JSON writer.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.JsonWriterOptions.Indented
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the JSON output should be indented. If set to , the JSON will be formatted with additional whitespace for readability (e.g., line breaks and indentation). If set to , the JSON will be written as a single line without extra whitespace, minimizing the output size.

member.name: T:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.Logging
member.summary: Represents the configuration settings for logging within the system.
member.remarks: This class provides properties for configuring console logging and Application Insights logging.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.Logging.Console
member.summary: Represents the configuration settings for console-based logging within the application.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.Logging.ApplicationInsights
member.summary: Represents the configuration settings for Application Insights logging functionality.

member.name: T:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.LogLevel
member.summary: Represents logging levels configuration for various components in the application.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.LogLevel.Default
member.summary: Gets or sets the default logging level for the application.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.LogLevel.MicrosoftAspNetCore
member.summary: Gets or sets the logging level configuration specific to Microsoft.AspNetCore components.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.LogLevel.AStar
member.summary: Gets or sets the logging level configuration specific to the AStar component.

member.name: T:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.MinimumLevel
member.summary: Represents the minimum logging levels configuration, providing a mechanism to define default logging levels as well as overrides for specific namespaces or components.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.MinimumLevel.Default
member.summary: Represents the default logging level configuration within the class, allowing the specification of a baseline logging level for the application.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.MinimumLevel.Override
member.summary: Represents configuration overrides for specific logging sources or categories within the class, allowing custom logging levels to be defined for particular components of the application.

member.name: T:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.Override
member.summary: Represents a configuration override for specific logging domains or namespaces.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.Override.MicrosoftAspNetCore
member.summary: The Microsoft.AspNetCore logging level override configuration.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.Override.SystemNetHttp
member.summary: The System.Net.Http logging level override configuration.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.Override.AStar
member.summary: The logging level override configuration specific to the AStar namespace or domain.

member.name: T:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.Serilog
member.summary: Represents the configuration settings for the Serilog logging framework. This class is used to define the settings such as log enrichment, log output destinations, and log level configurations.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.Serilog.Enrich
member.summary: A collection of enrichers used to add additional contextual data to log events. Each element in the array represents the name of an enricher to be applied during logging.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.Serilog.WriteTo
member.summary: A collection of targets where log events are written during logging. Each element in the array specifies the name of the sink and its associated arguments.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.Serilog.MinimumLevel
member.summary: Configures the minimum logging levels for log events. This property determines the default logging level and allows overrides for specific components or namespaces.

member.name: T:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.SerilogConfig
member.summary: Represents the configuration for Serilog logging within the application. This class provides properties to define the setup for logging, including Serilog-related configuration and general logging options.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.SerilogConfig.Serilog
member.summary: Represents the configuration for Serilog logging.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.SerilogConfig.Logging
member.summary: Represents the configuration for standard logging in the application. This class provides properties to define logging behavior, including settings for console output and Application Insights integration.

member.name: T:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.WriteTo
member.summary: Represents the configuration target for writing logs in a Serilog configuration.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.WriteTo.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the logging sink to which log events are written.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.Models.WriteTo.Args
member.summary: Gets or sets the arguments for configuring the logging sink.

member.name: T:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.SerilogConfigure
member.summary: Provides an extension method for configuring Serilog logging with Application Insights and console output.

member.name: M:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.SerilogConfigure.Configure(Serilog.LoggerConfiguration,Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration,Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.TelemetryConfiguration)
member.summary: Configures the Serilog logger using the specified settings and telemetry configuration.
member.param: The instance to be configured.
The application configuration settings to read from.
The instance used for Application Insights integration.
